SELECT recommend.id,recommend.title, recommend.content, recommend.difficulty, recommend.regdate, user.id as userID, user.nickName as nickName FROM ((recomCart INNER JOIN user ON recomCart.userID = user.id) INNER JOIN recommend ON recomCart.recomID = recommend.id);
